content.text:
# 1968 New York Film Critics Circle Awards

34th New York Film Critics Circle Awards
January 26, 1969(announced December 30, 1968)
----
Best Picture:
The Lion in Winter
The 34th New York Film Critics Circle Awards, honored the best filmmaking of 1967.
Winners
*Best Actor:
**Alan Arkin - The Heart Is a Lonely Hunter
*Best Actress:
**Joanne Woodward - Rachel, Rachel
*Best Director:
**Paul Newman - Rachel, Rachel
*Best Film:
**The Lion in Winter
*Best Foreign Language Film:
**War and Peace (Voyna i mir) â€¢ Soviet Union
*Best Screenplay:
**Lorenzo Semple Jr. - Pretty Poison
*Special Award:
**Yellow Submarine
References
External links
*[http://www.nyfcc.com/awards/?awardyear=1968 1968 Awards]
